attributes.action: intervene to ensure Dale and Sally Foster are afforded the same treatment over their misuse of CAB cash as the hundreds of MPs who have misused taxpayers cash.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cash is cash.  Misuse is misuse.  However, when it comes down to it if you are an MP you can claim 'mistake' or 'error of judgement' when you embezzle taxpayers.  Why, therefore, should these two be sent to jail or receive any punishment more than any of the MPs, to date, have.  They should go to the Court of Human Rights and demand to be treated in the same way as the lawmakers of this country.

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms), we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. It is a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
